short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Glopinion allows you to extract key insights from any reading and evaluate them as a group

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool allows users of the Glopinion app to save articles and extract insights in their browser.

IMPORTANT: to benefit from this extension, you need to install the Glopinion app which currently is exclusively available for students, researchers and professors at the University of Geneva (www.unige.ch); users must already be registered to a course or a course module that uses Glopinion and in possession of a valid username and password.
